content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend walked out on the rocks at the very end of pleaser point in santa cruz basically facing south. out of the corner of my eye to the north i noticed something that looked like a single, dark grey (but with a glow from the moon) object traveling down the coastline about a mile off the land. right when i saw it i pointed at it and kept my finger in line with the object til my friend confirmed he saw it too. we continued to watch the object travel into the monterney bay(at a rediculously fast speed). it made no sound and traveled just bearly off the water. once the object got to a certain point in the bay it made a upward breaking right monuver and completely exited the atmonsphere and disapeared.When the object pulled above the horizon we relized it was in fact three objects traveling very close together in a v shape with one craft in front leading the other two. once that happened my friend and i looked at eachother and we both new it was something extra terrestial. we then proceeded to walk quickly back to the truck discussing if we should be reporting the phenonenom to anyone.
content.summary: Object off california coast traveling rediculously fast

content.detailedDescription: While on a return flight from sydney to melbourne at around 9:00am i decided to take a photo outside of the plane window to capture the clouds. while placing the camera in a vertical position and looking through the preview screen i noticed a ball shape appear a split second just before i pressed the camera button and then it disappeared just as quickly. it did not fly away, it simply vanished. there is no motion blur in the photo and the plane was flying at around 700-800kph at an altitude of around 18,000 meters, so i can only assume that the object was following and keeping an exact pace with the aircraft in a "cloaked" state as it simply showed itself just as i was about to press the button. there is no way i could have just fluked it, it was as if it appeared on que.
content.summary: Silver sphere witnessed out of window over left wing.

content.detailedDescription:
Dont know if this is related (or not) to my sighting last night-but thought i should report it. 
since i saw the "pop" or burst of light from the supposed star last night --- today i have been having nose bleeds all day & have terrible buzzing that changes to high pitched ringing in my ears-driving me crazy!I never have nose bleeds-it's been @ least 10-15 years since i have had one. 
i have had ringing in the ears after a cold in the past-yet i have not had a cold/flu for 6 months or so...Please post if anyone else has these issues!Very strange!
 would love to hear from others...To put my mind at ease.
content.summary: Health issues related to the sighting(?)

content.detailedDescription: It was early in the morning, clear skies. i noticed in the sky ahead of me to the north at an altitude about 30 - 60 km i guess. 100000ft or something. looking at first like a regular shooting star i noticed it was moving at up to twice the speed of a regular shooting star, and had no trail. it moved in a direction across my left shoulder in a curving/zipping kind of fashion. the path it took was not linear or a simple curve, it had a sharp irregular swerving path that convinced me it was not a shooing star at all. it disappeared and another appeared at the original spot and began traversing a similar path then promptly disappeared  after that. my friend did not see it clearly and only said that they had noticed only a movement in the sky.
content.summary: Two small fast moving high altitude objects

content.detailedDescription: My dad, sister, friend and i were driving into s san francisco going to get the car washed when i noticed a slow moving silver light in the sky. it mostly hovered very high up not doing much besides very randomly flashing and eventually leaving our line of sight in the most mind blowing quickest way possible (very reminiscant of the recent temple mount ufo video except in daylight). all of us saw it and none of use could explain it away. i absolutely believe in the existance of technologies that are beyond the comprehension of the average sheep (person), whether they are terrestrial secret tech or other worldly objects i don't know. i do however know what i saw was one of those two things. i do have a photo my sister took with a digital camera but it's rather far away and a bit grainy. if you would like me to send it i will gladly e-mail it directly to someones address. oh btw, my eyes are always to the skies and i have witnessed just one other unbelieveble event in my life. as soon as i saw the object i knew what it was and honestly i wasn't at all suprised as i firmly believe that very soon the whole world will be certain this type of technology exists. whether they are piloted by the 'greys' or very privledged pilots on the payroll of the naval department, will remain to be seen. please feel free to contact me by mail or phone. this is very honestly real.
content.summary: Strange object in sky today

content.detailedDescription: I had just arrived home an i walked down the driveway to check the mail it was between 4:45 an 5:00 pm eastern time. walking back up my driveway i peered up the end of my street cuz there was a storm brewing an it looked crazy because thethe shorm was low an bove it the sun was shning an the clouds were bunching up just above the tree line an there where some small clouds that looked like a mist they were small and thin wen they moved i noticed this small silver metallic looking ball just like a dot in the sky it was still cuz the clouds where moving past it an what gave it away was the way the angle of the sun reflected off of it it looked like it was invisible wen the light hit the object it showed its appearance now i stood there and stared at this thing fer a good 4 minutes before i had to run all the way upstairs into my room to get my camera an ran as fast as i could back outside an managed to capture 3-5 seconds of footage before this object started to dance around the sky an out of nowhere this larger what appear to be a silverish almost invisible (it looked kinda like if u had a clear lavalamp with silver metallic effect in the shape of a sphere streak across the sky and disappeared behind a cloud it appeard like it went into onota lake witch is just up the street form where i filmed this from my fathers driveway just as i was trying to focus the camera and get steady. upon review of the footage i noticed that wen slowed down that you can see it many times and you can see how it maneuvers in differnt directions i will attach the video i took that day this is the original footage it is mp4 format shot on a sony webbie hd camerathis footage was uploaded on july 9th 2010 but it was filmed a day the week before i cant remember. also want to report 7-8 dark orange spheres on dec 24 2010 over pittsfield airport seen these objects for about a minute while driving home an then watched them for about 30 seconds from my front yard unfortunately my camera doesn't record at night but they slowly drifted to the east from the south west part of the city before the orange glow they had each started fading one by one now i know that other people seen this because it was directly in front of bosquet ski area  and they were in the sky just above and in front of the slopes. and on several occasions i have seen these red orang lights streak across the sky usually u just barely catch em out the corner of your eye cuz of thier speed. i would like to share this footage but i dont want all kinds of people in the community to think im a crazy but i will answer any questions you have
content.summary: Footage i shot from my driveway just before a thunderstorm over onota lake

content.detailedDescription:
Out side star gazing-looking @ nothing in particular, when a faint star in my range of vision all of a sudden grew very bright & increased dramatically in size. it was almost like a "pop" of light. after the pop of light vanished w/ in 4-5 seconds the star was no longer visible. i thought perhaps a satellite may have exploded, but read another report that is strikingly similar to my sighting on the same night...So felt compeled to report it.
this was seen from the town of sonoma ca looking to the south west @ aprox 7:15 pm
content.summary: Faint "star" grows to bright light

content.detailedDescription:
Im 15yrs old, & live in san antonio.
around 3am or 3:30 something woke me up a strange noise from outside my window. as i looked up something shot into my room, a white bright ball just in the middle. i looked at it for about 5 secs. while it was in my room there was a strange noise to it that i cant explain.As i saw the ball of light it shot out of my room & made a loud noise as it left in a ufo.
what made this more intresting to me is that the sameday there was another ufo sighting caught on tape similar to what i saw. and there was also more sightings during the same week & couple of days after.
content.summary: I heard a loud noise and i turned i was staring at a ball of white light with a high beam shoot into my bedroom thru the window and shot out and made a loud noise as it entered and exited.

content.detailedDescription: I was going for an evening walk.  i stopped to adjust my ipod and some movement in the sky caught my eye.  i looked up and saw an object moving.  at first i thought it was a cloud or flock of geese.  the object was flying from south to north.  the object had no lights, sound, or contrails.  it moved at a rapid speed and was barely noticeable.  it almost seemed like it was cloaked in a cloud or fog but the skies were clear.  i could only see the shape of it because it blocked out the sky as it flew over head.  it wasn't very high in the sky at all.  i lost sight of it behind some trees but i ran around the trees only to see the back of it as it flew away north.  my heart was pounding so rapidly after this event.  i assure you it was not a plane, chopper, glider, or any other type of craft i have ever seen.  it was a small craft and i doubt more than two adults could fit in it.  since 2009 there have been many strange sightings in the skies around mendocino and sonoma counties in northern california but people are too embarrassed to report them.
content.summary: Dark object spotted in northern california sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from the local shops after buying some groceries, i was just coming into my street, my house is at the bottom of the street so probably still a minute away by foot.  as i entered my street i noticed out of my peripheral a red pulsating light, much like that you would see on the wing of an air plane, where i live this is not an unusual sight as there are two airports in the city, what struck me as strange was the speed the object was going, way too fast to be a plane and i actually remember saying in my head 'woaw that planes going really fast', i kept watching the object as it paced across the sky just above the roof lines, when it stopped dead. at this point my eyes were glued to the object, i was still walking down my street when i got to my front door, eyes still on the object, i knocked on the door and my fiance came out and she also saw the object. she brushed it off as an airplane and went back inside. i stayed out to watch completely confused at the pulsating light, stationary in the sky.  after a few minutes from behind me over my roof, very high in the shy another two lights shot across the sky in the direction of the red pulsating light, these two lights however were solid and very bright, almost white with a slight yellow tinge. as they aproached the pulsating light they abruptly turned right and disapeared into the sky, a few moments later the red pulsating light started to drift slowly away until i could no longer see them behind the roof tops. at this point i went inside.

i am very confused as to what i saw, however i went on youtube and searched for ufo sightings in my city and they seem to be quite common. 

thank you
content.summary: Pulsating lights in sky.

content.detailedDescription: Looking at a web cam on one of the condos at jupiter beach florida. web cam stills ar 15 sec exposure and 1600 iso. im not a person who knows  about camara settings. i have a whole bunch of these photos, can someone please tell me if this is an airplane or something else? some photos have 3 seperate lights side by side. i dont think jetliners fly side by side very close. if its a plane, then thats fine, i just want to know...
content.summary: Airplane or not?????

content.detailedDescription: Standing on the beach looked up and sow the most incredabe flying ufo it flow over and did not make a sownd at all but did leave a vapertrell after it was gone
content.summary: Two story flat football fild shape quiet two redis light on bottom

content.detailedDescription:
Here i am, once again reporting another sighting. this time, it was not seen through my telescope (it kept moving in and out of the tree line, and my line of sight). anyway, it was above what looked like the area above cambrian plaza. so it was a star-like object but lower than a star, hovering and moving a bit left, right, up, and down slowly. it was at about 45 degree angle at my view point from my back patio.

it appeared to be the size of a pencil eraser top, and was illuminating red, blue, and white. it wasn't so much as "flashing", but more like one of those lights that doesn't flash, but slowly changes into another color. that's what this one was doing, but really fast.

i watched it from 22:45 hrs, till 23:15 hrs. it kept moving like i said, but in a hovering fashion. i gave up and debated if i was going to put in a report, but decided to because there was no way this was a plane, chopper, or anything explanable. 

the sky had some thin clouds, but in the area of the object, it was crystal clear. it appeared to me to be at about 600-700 feet above ground, and i was unable to determine any sound from it. during the time that i was observing this, there were no planes, choppers, or any other items in the sky in the area. very odd since all week the objects have had planes and choppers hanging around close by.
content.summary: It came back again! welcome back!

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my annual visit to the kelling heath star party. yes, i am an amateur astronomer. i specialise in visual astronomy. i spend more time looking at the sky and looking through telescopes.

the event is held at the kelling heath camping and caravan park.
the location is ideal for the hobby, as it provides very dark skies- weather permitting. the star party is also known as the equinox star party. it is one of many events held in the uk.I had made this trip with my wife and two yound children aged 3 and 2 years of age.

i recall waking early (around 8am) since i had been awake late observing the previous night. having made a coffee, i was about to stroll to see who else was up. i always carry my camera around with me at camp.

i was just admiring the lovely pristine clear skies and hoping it would give us another clear night of observing. when, i noticed the object in the sky. at first i thought, it might be a helium ballon (for birthdays) or an advertising balloon.

but, it was just hanging in the sky motionless and quite. i immediately aimed my sony f717 dsc camera and took a shot.
i looked at the image in the lcd screen, zoomed in to check it was captured and it was. i the looked at the object again to frame it. i may have looked at it for no more than 2 seconds, when it dissappeared at the blink of an eye. i could not fathom what it could have been. i was totally stunned and just stood there for a good 30 seconds, in case it came back. i was not scared in any way. just curious.

i mentioned it to another astronomer and showed him the picture. he just laughed at me warned me to be careful at night, in case it came back for me.
of course, it never came back.

of course having a more science back ground from my hobby about the universe than joe public, i do believe there is a high probabality of extra terrestrials.

when i am out under the cover of a starry night, i do see a lot of strangely behaving lights, but these are all logically explained ie. satellites, meteors, birds, weather phenomenons ets. but, my event is not like the ordinary one i come across.

i have good knowledge of telescopes, cameras and weather variables. i truely think this experience is a rare one. would i like to experience another one, not so sure.
content.summary: Whilst walking at campsite, noticed an object in the sky. it was very still. no sound. there was no movement. i observed it for around 10 seconds. managed to photographed it. it literally dissappeared, at the blink of an eye.

content.detailedDescription:
I was fliming the moon after watching the super bowl at around 7:30 pm.

as i was trying to focus the camera, a bright light resembling a

missile shot up from the bottom west by north west from the

 monterey bay into my view of the moon.  the object flew diagonally

 across going up in front of the moon and as it passed the moon, it 

turned and flew straight up.I was very excited and was hoping that 

i caught it on flim.And i did!!!....Wow!........If someone is out 

there doing the any real investigating please call asap..!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

tried to flim more but no other ufos......
content.summary: Filming the moon and caught an object on video flying accross the moon with great speed. this object then paused, turned and shot straight up into space.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside (looking west) looking at the stars when i thought i saw a shooting star..But it just kept going. then i thought it must be a plane. so i was just watching. it had 1 bright light and 3 smaller lights around the bright one. not really looking like a plane. it seemed to just stop moving, then it went around in a circle. stopped again then started moving in my direction. then stopped again. that's when i can see the light formation perfectly.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights moving strange

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east boound o i-70 at o525 am going to pick up my farther in law, i glanced to the south east seeing this thing just sitting there in the sky, very bright very noticable, looking around not seeing no other stars, i was about a mile east of chapman ks when i frist seen it and keeping one eye on the road looked to see the time on my dash, so i know what time it was, kept looking over to see if it would move or not, as i got closer to the rest area west of juction city, it moved out of my veiw, could have been cloud cover or it had move. just before i got to my arivle ponit i stoped on the highest ponit i could and looked for it again, but it was gone.

1. driving west to east

2. it's brightness and no other stars

3. sts maybe

4. motionless

5. surprise tryed to keep it in sight

6. posiably cloud cover
content.summary: Bright star like, no stars over cast

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of 01/25/2011 i was on my back porch, looking at the sky. the sky was cloudless, but there was haze or smog which was reflecting the city streetlights, making it rather bright. the stars were visible, notably orion, which i was looking at while facing east. 

at 1911 hours i noticed movement to the left in my peripheral vision. i was surprised to see a pitch black object moving swiftly from north to south across my field of vision, passing just below the constellation orion. while the object was directly in front of me it appeared as an isosceles triangle, the length being approximately twice the width, with the point at the front. it was angled slightly away from me, consistent with the object's "wingspan" being parallel to the ground and me observing it from underneath from the west. the object disappeared quickly into the haze as it departed to the south. i estimate the duration of the sighting as 1, not more than 2 seconds. there were no lights on the object, it was completely black against the slightly orange cast of the sky. the edges seemed very sharp while it was directly in front of me, but it was more vague as it approached and departed. there were numerous airliners and general aviation aircraft visible at the time which were clearly audible. i heard no sound that could be attributed to the passing of the object. i estimate the object was considerably lower than the airliners i could see which were on final approach to orange county and lax.
content.summary: Extremely fast black triangle

content.detailedDescription: First off i'd like to say that a telescope or a pair of binoculars is the best thing to have on hand during theses incidents....Believe it or not! i do not not remember the exact date of this incident, but i clearly remember what i/we saw. it was summer time and me, my ex girlfriend, and her cousin were horse playing around at her aunts house in the driveway. it was late in the evening when the sun had almost set. i always liked to look up at the sky, and up until that day i'd never seen anything unusual other than comets. as i looked up west in the sky i could see some of the stars that were becoming visible because night was about to fall, but there was was an odd one sitting there shining a bright reddish-orange color. i pointed it out to my ex girlfriend (girlfriend at the time) and her cousin. they thought it was odd as well. then her cousin came up with the assumption that it was one of the planets in our solar system that could be seen with the naked eye  that time of year. that theory of his was quickly destroyed when that object started to move to the right (north). we were all awe struck! it was a very big coincidence to me that i remembered that her cousin had a telescope that he had never used before. i was very excited and anxious to see up close what this thing was, so i told him to hurry and run inside to get his telescope. he did and meanwhile my ex was very excited and scared. she ran inside also to tell here aunt about it. by the time my ex, her aunt, and her cousin came back out (3min) the view of the object was ubstruckted by several big pine trees. my first instinct was to have all three of them to jump in my car. we did and the closest and biggest open space i could think of is this middle school that had a track in the back of it about less than a quarter mile away. when we got there we still saw the object in the sky. i quickly set up the telescope and i was extremely amazed of what i saw. this thing was shaped almost like a diamond with four similar diamond like objects that were spinning independently while at the same time all four of the smaller objects were rotating around the bigger object and they were not connected to anything(all had a fiery glow)! i'll also remind you that my ex, her aunt, and her cousin also looked into the telescope and saw what i saw. there was a 5th witness to. this guy was running around that track with his wife that evening. he was curious about what we were looking at. we were so amazed by what we were looking at that we just told the guy to look for himself. when he did he became frantic and was yelling for his wife to come take a look. by the time she made it to us, the object sped away like nothing i'd ever seen......In a blink of an eye going north! i hear people talking all of the about secret military experiments. i know for a fact that what we saw that evening wasn't any type of military experiment. the human body isn't built to take on that type of speed! i may not have any kind of video or photos to back my claims up, but i know what i and the others saw was very real and not of this planet! i urge everyone to use a telescope or binoculars so you can get a detailed view of the strange lights that are seen in our skies!
content.summary: What we thought was a reddish-orange star wasnt.....

content.detailedDescription: This night was warmer than all the other cold winter nights so i went out with the intention to observe for any interesting aerospace activity. the sky was active with multiple starlike objects. two had been observed flying toward each other but not on a collision course. many of the other starlike objects had been going almost directly west, east, etc. like they were following a grid. it appeared that jet aircraft had been regularly patrolling the skies. a few looked like they were getting a closer look at me. i had cameras with me but didn't feel the need to record anything. i am however investing in a pair of night vision binoculars soon to record the night sky. it will surely come in handy... further down investment for my ufo research is a device that monitors the electromagnetic spektrum and emf radiation.
content.summary: Multiple starlike objects flying in many directions. regular jet airforce patrols.

content.detailedDescription: I had decided to take the trash out to the bin in the backyard. looked at the clear night sky a few times while i was out, to see if the starlike objects i see occasionally were present. there was no apparent activity i could see. i than decided to acknowledge from my personal experience that the starlike objects are known to appear no matter where i am, so i asked for a sign and went inside to warm up. some minutes later i went outside on the back deck and looked up to see one starlike object flying over from east to west, approximately above 5,000 ft, no nav/strobe lights, just white/starlike. i held up my hand and waved. a separate quick starlike flash of light occurred some distance behind and aside from the westbound object. this sighting did not cause any distress, i always find it fascinating and exciting to see these flying objects.
content.summary: The night sky was clear. no ufos in sight. i asked for a sign. a flyby soon appeared.

content.detailedDescription: As my friends, redacted, redacted, redacted, and *(name deleted--cms/sg) were walking to a party late at night, we heard some strange high pitched whirring noises. the air was cold, and it was a long walk until the party, but we did not think anything of it, so we kept our heads down, and our minds on the party. it was going to be an awesome party, and it turned out it was. it was a communist themed party, and it was a three dollar cover, unless we dressed as communists. we were not informed of this detail beforehand, so we ended up paying the three dollar cover, which was low considering the amount of live bands they had. as we got onto the street of the party, the whirring noise came back, and was louder, but nothing was going to deter us from going inside of the party, so we went into the party. music was blaring from the basement, and there were tons of hipsters and cool people there. if you were wondering what a hipster is, it is a person who wears black rimmed glasses and likes offbeat stuff. so we made our way into the kitchen, and i met my friend **(name deleted--cms/sg) and she was really quiet. she wasn't really into the party, and i get it, that type of party is not many people's scene. but we were trying to enjoy the party, so all of us went downstairs into the basement, and listened to some really cool bands. after about half an hour, we were looking for a drink, and we noticed that the party was bring your own beer, so we all ventured out of the house to the nearest liquor store. on the way back from the liquor store with boxes of beer and some 40 ounce alcohol containers, we heard the whirring noise, and what sounded like an engine from overhead. but we had so much alcohol on us, that we completely ignored it and went back inside of the party. after listening to some more bands, and drinking some more beer, our friends band was on, and they were great. they played a cover of the who's, "baba o'riley," which i mistakenly thought was called teenage wasteland. my friend quickly corrected me, saying that it was baba o'riley, and i had an epiphany, and was like, "oh, yeah, you're right." it was really hot, so me and my friend **(name deleted--cms/sg) went outside for some cigarettes. while standing on the porch, we saw a flash of light moving really fast over the trees, and **(name deleted--cms/sg)said to me, "that was really strange," to which i agreed. then, we went back inside of the party, because it was a really great party. so then, there was some sort of dance off going on in the basement, and everyone was banging on the walls and ceilings, and our friend, redacted, came in 5th place, which was a lot of fun and there are pictures of it on facebook if you want to see. afterwards, we decided that we would leave the party, and go back to my place to have a drink. so all of us were walking on the street, when a chevron shaped objected flew over our heads, and we noticed it was a ufo. and it was.
content.summary: Ufo flying very low over residential areas

content.detailedDescription:
Civil air patrol field trip from carson city high school. southbound on us 95. object sighted when we got to about n 38.04917 w 117.89841 on us 95. about 12 or so students, parents and teacher. all of us were in a school bus.

object first sighted on the western horizon and moved eastward across the sky and then out of sight behind hills. the object was brilliant and illuminated everything within the visible horizon. object reached a peak angle of about 45 degrees above the horizon. colors of vegetation and soil in the distance was easily discernible. reading of magazine/newsprint inside the bus was possible from reflected light.

no sound was noted. no tail as in a meteor/bolide. no smoke. no flashing lights. no object attached to the light that we could discern.

total time object visible was probably two minutes plus or minus.

we had no notions of what the object was other than a bright, round light.

after the object moved behind the hills to the east it got dark instantly. after another minute or so we noted a bright flash over the horizon. our immediate concern was that the object may have started a wildland fire.

after arriving in tonopah the teacher/driver called authoritys to report the incident. again our major concern was wildfire not so much what the object may have been.

we spent the next three days hiking in the tempiute/mt irish area with no further incidents. to this day, none of us has ever been interviewed about the event to my knowledge.

we had a camera but were not able to retrieve it in time.
content.summary: Very bright, round, angular size=moon/sun, moving east

content.detailedDescription: I feel silly about this but....Was driving home from work between 8-8:30.  my attention was caught by a very bright light to my left.  on closer inspections i could make out 3 centers in the light that blended to form an oval shape.  it seemed to be very high and for the distance seemed huge, way bigger than any plane lights could be and the wrong color.  thought it must be a plane on fire.  then it began to descend fairly quickly and i thought that the plane was going to try to get to the doylestown airport.  but then it abruptly shot straight up and began a kind of zig-zag pattern of movement. then, the creepiest part....In a millisecond it was gone.  i didn't even blink.  sat for 5 more minutes waiting, but that was it.  what the heck was that???
content.summary: 3 very bright, large yellowish lights that blended into oval shape, erratic movement, abrupt disappearance

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on back porch at 5:20 am pst casually glancing at the still dark sky. the sky was clear, nearly clear with few if any clouds.

at this time i noted what appeared to be a star (fixed point and not moving) slowly increase in brightness from nearly invisible to extremely bright. easily the brightest object in the sky at that moment by a lot.
the object then slowly decreased in brighteness from very intense to nearly invisible. the entire cycle took perhaps 30 seconds. a second cycle took place aproximately a minute later taking less than half the time of the first cycle but with the same maximum intensity and either the same location or very close to it.

the object was located in the sky at ~ 45 degrees elevation and 355 degrees azmuth.
content.summary: Fixed star like object increased brightness substantially over 20 seconds then fades to nearly invisible

content.detailedDescription: My wife and myself were driving on road 100 toward the interstate, i noticed two red orbs circling each other.  it looked as though the orbs were over road 68 in pasco.  one of the orbs lowered in elevation and turned blue.  we kept driving and could not see the orbs.
content.summary: Two red orbs circled each other and one turned blue

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were outside the front of my house talking when a round, soft white in brightness large sphere caught my peripheral vision. i voiced out what's that! my friend saw it also but he thought it was a balloon. we watched it as it traveled from the northwest to southwest horizons in about 5 seconds. it was traveling at an extremely high rate of speed. no noise was heard. no blinking lights, just a pure soft white glow. it was at a high altitude because its glow diminished when it traveled behind thin high altitude clouds in the sky. i was amazed at how fast the object went from horizon to horizon. it traveled in an absolute straight line without deviation, no fluctuation whatsoever as the type that wind would cause. it was a windy evening in the s.F. bay area. we lost sight of it when it went below the southwest visible horizon(behind a house across the street).
content.summary: Round, spherical,soft white in color

content.detailedDescription: We were alarmed by a helicopter that was flying very low over our house. i ran out onto my front porch with my two children just in time to see a red light fly over directly over our house with a helicopter close behind. they continued east until they both disappeared. the helicopter was very loud and didn't sound like a medical helicopter. it sounded more like a military helicopter because of it's size and sound. the helicopter had blinking white lights on it. the red light was just a red light. nothing more. i have no idea what it was.
content.summary: Red light followed by helicopter

content.detailedDescription: While lying on the ground in fig tree park in plantation fl at 5:50 pm i saw a small silver reflective ball very high up in the sky. if it were dark i would say it looked like saturn. it was still very much daylight so i started to fell like it was not something normal. it was as high as a commercial jet or higher. it traveled exactly south to north. it did not change altitude that i could notice. from my location i would estimate it was flying between i 95 and the ocean approximately  15 degrees off of straight up. it traveled north for at least 5-10 minutes before i lost it in a cloud and was never able to reacquire. it was witnessed by my self and my wife. it did not leave contrails. it had no flashing lights. there was no sound. my first real thought was maybe the iss or some other satellite or the space shuttle. no photos!
content.summary: Small silver ball heading directly north

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend called me and my son,*(name deleted--cms/sg) outside and these starlike objects were shooting across the sky at different heights and different brightnesses, and im a very skeptical person and ive never seen anything like it ! there was probably about 75-100 of them.And we were freaking out. we tried videoing it but it was too dark and it just didnt come out good. i was trying to get the camera to work but we were in so much shock that we couldnt.
content.summary: About 75-100 things flying across the sky going in a westward direction
